name: And then it went silent
description:
Game made for Indie Game Dev Beginners #002 game jam

A 3D story based adventure, narrating the life of Edwin,

WASD to move, SPACE to jump, CLICK to interact

This game utilizes negative nostalgia; instead of having good memories to focus on, the main character goes through his old trauma. 

STORY:

Edwin has had a harsh upbringing. He watched his parents die in front of him, with him not being able to save them. He is now stuck working late hours in an office job. He goes home mentally fatigued and gets ready to sleep. As he is about to go to bed, he reminisces of his childhood and falls asleep.
